channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cram Social Program Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cram Social Program Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1106|2024-09-16T18:07:51.657Z -- ibm -- cram%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 5.2, 6.0, and 7.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 120744.

item.title: CVE-2017-1195|2024-09-16T16:52:56.227Z -- ibm -- cram%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 6.0, 6.1, 6.2, and 7.0 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 123670.

item.title: CVE-2016-9732|2024-09-16T16:53:10.404Z -- ibm -- cram%20social%20program%20management
item.description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 6.0, 6.1, 6.2 and 7.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 119761.
